title: 115_hr2257
content: The Act is titled the "Guard and Reservists Education Improvement Act" and aims to consolidate certain eligibility tiers under the Post-9/11 Educational Assistance Program of the Department of Veterans Affairs. The "Guard and Reservists Education Improvement Act" amends entitlement and the amount of educational assistance under the Post-9/11 Educational Assistance Program. It reduces the entitlement period from 12 to 6 months and eliminates paragraph 7. Additionally, it makes conforming amendments to various sections by renumbering paragraphs and adjusting references. The "Guard and Reservists Education Improvement Act" makes amendments to the Post-9/11 Educational Assistance Program by reducing the entitlement period to 6 months and eliminating paragraph 7. It also includes conforming amendments by renumbering paragraphs and adjusting references in various sections. The changes involve adjustments to paragraphs (2) through (6) and (3) through (7) in subparagraphs (B)(iii) and (C)(ii).
